author: kiwi.eth
content: https://medium.com/@william.j.villanueva/a-journey-through-phase-2-of-ethereum-2-0-c7a2397a36cb This is a great post that goes over a lot of phase 2 concepts

author: kiwi.eth
content: If you scroll you'll eventually find the EE stuff

author: 0xalizk
content: Are these beacon chain contracts just examples, or will they in fact be implemented as part of the protocol? In other words, is what's being defined a message standard that let's a shard verify the state of **arbitrary** beacon chain contracts and vice versa? or are these first-class contracts ..

author: kiwi.eth
content: They're currently the intended design, theres still lots of prototyping and research to be done so there is possibility for them to change

author: kiwi.eth
content: But the essense of it is to abstract contract processing from consensus
